parts.text: {"word":"problematically","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adverb","definition":"問題のあるように、厄介なことに、難題を抱えて","english_definition":"in a way that presents a problem or difficulty; in a troublesome manner.","examples":[{"sentence":"The project was problematically delayed due to funding issues.","translation":"そのプロジェクトは資金問題により、問題のある形で遅延した。"},{"sentence":"The new policy is problematically vague and open to interpretation.","translation":"新しい政策は問題のあるほど曖昧で、解釈の余地がある。"},{"sentence":"The data was problematically incomplete, making analysis difficult.","translation":"データに問題があるほど不備があり、分析が困難になった。"}],"collocations":["problematically vague (問題があるほど曖昧)","problematically delayed (問題がある形で遅延)","problematically incomplete (問題があるほど不完全)","problematically expensive (問題があるほど高価)","problematically complex (問題があるほど複雑)"],"synonyms":["troublesomely","difficultly","awkwardly","unsatisfactorily","inconveniently","adversely"],"antonyms":["unproblematically","easily","smoothly","satisfactorily","conveniently"]}],"etymology":{"value":"「problematic」に接尾辞「-ally」が付いたもの。「problematic」は「問題のある、厄介な」という意味で、さらに遡るとギリシャ語の「problema」（難題、問題）に由来する。","priority":"★★★"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˌprɒbləˈmætɪkli/","syllables":"prob-le-mat-i-cal-ly"},"inflection":{"notes":"副詞なので、活用形はありません。"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**problematically**」は、ある事柄が問題や困難を伴う様子を表す副詞です。何かがスムーズに進まない、または期待通りに機能しない状況を強調する際に使われます。しばしば、何らかの欠陥や不備によって事態が複雑化していることを示唆します。フォーマルな文脈や、問題点を指摘する際に用いられることが多い単語です。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The situation was problematically.","correct":"✓ The situation was problematic.","note":"形容詞「problematic」と副詞「problematically」の使い分けに注意。「The situation was problematic.」は「状況は問題があった」という意味で、状態を表す場合に適切です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He solved the problem problematically.","correct":"✓ He solved the problem in a problematic way.","note":"「問題のある方法で問題を解決した」と言いたい場合は、「in a problematic way」のように表現します。「problematically」は、解決策自体が問題を引き起こす可能性がある場合に使うこともできますが、この例では不適切です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The design was problematically, so we changed it.","correct":"✓ The design was problematic, so we changed it.","note":"デザイン自体に問題がある場合は形容詞「problematic」を使い、デザインが問題を引き起こしている状況を強調したい場合は「The design was problematically implemented.（デザインの実装に問題があった）」のように表現します。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["problematic (形容詞: 問題のある、厄介な)","problem (名詞: 問題、難題)"],"phrasal_verbs":[],"related_concepts":["difficulty","challenge","obstacle","issue","complication","drawback","flaw","defect","shortcoming","hitch","snag","impediment","setback","pitfall","dilemma","predicament","quandary","conundrum","enigma","puzzle","riddle","maze","labyrinth","morass","mire","quagmire","slough","snare","trap","trick","ruse","stratagem","ploy","maneuver","gambit","wile","artifice","subterfuge","deception","fraud","sham","hoax","spoof","parody","travesty","burlesque","farce","mockery","caricature","lampoon","satire","irony","sarcasm","cynicism","pessimism","nihilism","skepticism","agnosticism","atheism","secularism","humanism","rationalism","empiricism","positivism","pragmatism","utilitarianism","hedonism","stoicism","epicureanism","cynicism","skepticism","agnosticism","atheism","secularism","humanism","rationalism","empiricism","positivism","pragmatism","utilitarianism","hedonism","stoicism","epicureanism","cynicism","skepticism","agnosticism","atheism","secularism","humanism","rationalism","empiricism","positivism","pragmatism","utilitarianism","hedonism","stoicism","epicureanism","cynicism","skepticism","agnosticism","atheism","secularism","humanism","rationalism","empiricism","positivism","pragmatism","utilitarianism","hedonism","stoicism","epicureanism","cynicism","skepticism","agnosticism","atheism","secularism","humanism","rationalism","empiricism","positivism","pragmatism","utilitarianism","hedonism","stoicism","epicureanism","cynicism","skepticism","agnosticism","atheism","secularism","humanism","rationalism","empiricism","positivism","pragmatism","utilitarianism","hedonism","stoicism","epicureanism","cynicism","skepticism","agnosticism","atheism","secularism","humanism","rationalism","empiricism","positivism","pragmatism","utilitarianism","hedonism","stoicism","epicureanism","cynicism","skepticism","agnosticism","atheism","secularism","humanism","rationalism","empiricism","positivism","pragmatism","utilitarianism","hedonism","sto
